item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Iâ€™ve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereumâ€™s onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.
Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.
Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)
My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduitâ€™s mission to scale Ethereum!
item.dc:creator: @AndyDotETH
item.description:
Iâ€™ve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereumâ€™s onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.

Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.

Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)

My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduitâ€™s mission to scale Ethereum!

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Wrapped and rewarded.
The #ETHDenver $FLY scavenger hunt was next level.
Big thanks to our partners @EthereumDenver, @DIMO_network, @conduitxyz, @SuccinctLabs, @Coinbase, @Privy, @Rally, @variantfund, @tributelabsxyz, @arbitrum, @syndicateio for making the magic happen.
See you next year?

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: DIA is a trustless, decentralized network of oracles that can give your chain price feeds for any asset, random number generation, and more.
@DIAdata_org is a permissionless network powered by its Lasernet rollup, ensuring trustless computation and total verifiability.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
DIA is a trustless, decentralized network of oracles that can give your chain price feeds for any asset, random number generation, and more.

@DIAdata_org is a permissionless network powered by its Lasernet rollup, ensuring trustless computation and total verifiability.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: ZNS Connect is reimagining onchain identity. Let your users replace clunky wallet addresses with customized profile pages and catchy domain names.
Each @ZNSConnect page links with usersâ€™ social profiles and lets them share their bio, picture, location, and more.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Crossmint offers a full suite of tools for onchain app development.
Your rollupâ€™s dev community can get embedded wallets, auth + onboarding, tokenization, credentials, fiat on/off-ramps, and moreâ€”all in one simple packageâ€”with @crossmint.

Your rollupâ€™s dev community can get embedded wallets, auth + onboarding, tokenization, credentials, fiat on/off-ramps, and moreâ€”all in one simple packageâ€”with @crossmint.

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Hexagate stops DeFi hacks before they happen.

@hexagate_ uses real time monitoring to detect and prevent exploits on your chain early, and also protects your users from phishing and fraud.

Integrate Hexagate to make your chain safer.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Gas dot zip is the fastest one-stop gas refuel bridge for over 250 chains.
With @gasdotzip, users can instantly bridge to multiple destination chains in a single transaction. Integrate your rollup and make onboarding easier for your users.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Gas dot zip is the fastest one-stop gas refuel bridge for over 250 chains.

With @gasdotzip, users can instantly bridge to multiple destination chains in a single transaction. Integrate your rollup and make onboarding easier for your users.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Uniblock is the web3 API hub that lets devs go God Mode.
@Uniblock gives developers on your chain access to 1,500 APIs across 100 chains and 50 partners so they can stay agile, consolidate tooling costs, and build anything.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Web3Auth is the Wallets-as-a-Service provider that supercharges your rollupâ€™s UX instantly.
@Web3Auth uses the latest account abstraction innovations to make wallets easy for users: Seedless logins, native mobile, fiat on-ramp support, and more.
